reviewtext: These are total budget binoculars.  Focus is not user friendly.  Forget about it if you wear glasses (like me).  I usually close one eye and use them as monoculars to spy on birds from my couch.  One day I'll replace them or give the to my young nephew.If you want a decent "cheap" pair of for kids, these work well.  If you are looking for a quality lower-price binoculars, I would spend a little more on a different pair.
